title: Sarah Jones – 2021 Comments on Fire Safety Repairs for Leaseholders
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sarah Jones, the Shadow Minister for Policing and Fire, on 21 April 2021.
content:
I am grateful to the Lords for voting to protect leaseholders from being forced to pay huge sums for fire safety repairs.
